wikipedia_page.main: Howard Charles Adie Gaunt (13 November 1902 – 1 February 1983) was an English schoolmaster and clergyman who also played first-class cricket for Warwickshire in 11 matches between 1919 and 1922. He was born at Edgbaston, Birmingham and died at Winchester, Hampshire.

link_mentions.page: List of Warwickshire County Cricket Club players
response: * Howard Gaunt (1919–1922) : H. C. A. Gaunt (11)
